actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 93-337.
Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: An original joint resolution to prohibit any reduction in the number of employees of the Forest Service during the current fiscal year.

summary.text: Provides that during the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, the number of permanent, full-time employees employed by the Department of Agriculture to carry out the activities of the Forest Service shall be maintained at not less than four hundred and fifty above the June 30, 1973, permanent, full-time personnel ceiling authorized for such Service by the Department of Agriculture.

titles.title: An original joint resolution to prohibit any reduction in the number of employees of the Forest Service during the current fiscal year.
